resources.string:
1. Open 'Browser Screen' to search video or enter video url

2. If a video found, click to download button at right bottom corner

3. Download Manager will start download your video

4. After download video completed, back to home and open 'Video Screen' to watch your video
Video Downloader allows you to download your favorite videos from Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and any other websites.
Just give it a try and download your favorite videos now!
Do you enjoy our app? Please take a second to rate and review it!
YOUTUBE IS NOT SUPPORTED DUE TO THEIR TERMS OF SERVICE !!!
